title: The passionate sparke of a relenting minde. Written by Simion Grahame. Seene and allowed by authority
author: Grahame, Simion, ca. 1570-1614.
publisher: By Humfrey Lownes [for Christopher Pursett], and are to be sold at his shop at the west doore of S. Paules Church,
notes: Each page printed within an architectural border.
Identified as STC 12169a on UMI microfilm.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
